doc.title: Journey to Land's End
doc.plot: Director Gregg Ensminger takes you on a trip to Mexico's exotic Baja peninsula. Along the way, you'll experience many surprises, from nature to everyday people, all taken in pictures so rich and colorful, you'll swear you were right there! Starting off among the Red Rocks of Sedona, which the director calls home, before heading west to California, and then south by sea to Cabo San Lucas, this is an unforgettable journey to Land's End. Listen as the director offers his own humorous take on the experience. It's a wonderful journey, shot in magnificent HD, and using beautiful cutting-edge film photography. This is Baja Mexico as you've never seen it before.
